name: Yannica
aura: Increases Ally ATK in All Battles by 30%.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

Attacks all enemies 2 times instead if this Champion is under a [Veil] buff.
skills.name: Even the Odds
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 3 turns if this attack is critical. Grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Baffling Speed
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Will ignore [Shield] buffs.

Removes [Shield] buffs from targets if this Champion is under a [Veil] buff or [Perfect Veil] buff, then deals extra damage equal to 15% of the value of the removed [Shield] buffs.
skills.name: Elven Judgment
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1
